APP_PUBLIC_URL.description: The HTTPS URL of this app: either your custom domain or default 'herokuapp.com' hostname.

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: (Optional) Set your AWS Access Key ID to enable S3 file storage. Defaults to Cloudinary storage

S3_ACCESS_SECRET_KEY.description: AWS Access Secret Key, if using S3 file storage.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

S3_BUCKET_REGION.description: Region of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

S3_ASSET_HOST_URL.description: Optional custom CDN asset host url, if using S3 file storage.

WEBDAV_SERVER_URL.description: URL of your WebDAV server, if using WebDAV file storage

WEBDAV_USERNAME.description: Username for your WebDAV server, if using WebDAV file storage

WEBDAV_PASSWORD.description: Password for your WebDAV server, if using WebDAV file storage

WEBDAV_PATH_PREFIX.description: Optional path prefix for your WebDAV server, if using WebDAV file storage

WEBDAV_STORAGE_PATH_PREFIX.description: Optional storage path prefix for  your WebDAV server, if using WebDAV file storage
